Entry.Name: Insecure Tls Version Plist
Entry.Description: By setting the version of TLS < 1.2, the application is vulnerable to attacks that exploit known vulnerabilities in the older versions of the protocol.

Mitigation.Suggested Steps:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Xcode);
2. Search the Info.plist file in the project;
3. In case there is NSExceptionMinimumTLSVersion set to 'TLSv1.0' or 'TLSv1.1' inside the NSAppTransportSecurity dictionary, remove the the value and replace it with 'TLSv1.2' (default value) or 'TLSv1.3';
4. For example from
NSExceptionMinimumTLSVersion
TLSv1.1 to
NSExceptionMinimumTLSVersion
TLSv1.3
